xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content: confluence.migrator.application=Confluence Migrator ### Wizzard steps confluence.migrator.step.prerequisites.label=Step 1 confluence.migrator.step.prerequisites.description=Prerequisites confluence.migrator.step.spaceanalysis.label=Step 2 confluence.migrator.step.spaceanalysis.description=Space analysis ### Profile confluence.migrator.profile=Profile confluence.migrator.profile.edit=({0}edit{1}) confluence.migrator.profile.confluenceSpaceURL=Confluence Space URL confluence.migrator.profile.title=Title confluence.migrator.profile.titlehint=The title of the profile Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_username=Username Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_usernamehint=Your Atlassian account username. Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_token=Token Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_tokenhint=The API token for your Atlassian account that will be used to enable the analysis of your Confluence data. Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_url=URL Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_urlhint=The URL of the Confluence instance (ex: https://my.atlassian.net/). Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_space=Space Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_spacehint=The space that will be imported in XWiki. confluence.migrator.start=Start migration confluence.migrator.resume.current=The current profile is active. Please [[resume the current migration>>Confluence.Migrator]]. confluence.migrator.resume.other=The current active profile is has not finished running. Please resume [[{0}>>{1}]] before starting the current profile. confluence.migrator.profile.description=A migration profile is defined by the data about authentication, the Confluence instance URL and the space to be migrated. The status of the migration is stored into the profile so that the migration can resumed at any step. confluence.migrator.profile.active=The profile [[{0}>>{1}]] has been actived for the current migration with the following parameters : confluence.migrator.profile.activenext=To start the migration with the current profile, click on the **Next** button. confluence.migrator.profile.create=Click on the following link to [[create a new profile>>path:{0}]]. confluence.migrator.profile.orcreate=If the existing profiles do not match your needs, you can [[create a new profile>>path:{0}]] to start a new migration. confluence.migrator.profile.activecurrent=The current migration runs with the following parameters : confluence.migrator.profile.activemissing=There is no active migration profile. confluence.migrator.profile.list=You can start the migration from one of the existing profiles : confluence.migrator.start.migration=Start this migration confluence.migrator.reset.migration=Reset migration confluence.migrator.profile.update=Updating migration profile. confluence.migrator.profile.updatesuccess=The migration profile has been updated. confluence.migrator.profile.reset=Resetting migration profile. confluence.migrator.profile.resetsuccess=The migration has been reset successfully. ### Prerequisites confluence.migrator.prerequisites.title=Prerequisites confluence.migrator.prerequisites.description=At this step the minimal requirements for the migration are being listed. ### Space analysis confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.title=Confluence space analysis confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.description=This script has the objective of analysing a remote Confluence space and detect pages that would cause importing problems because of the page length. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.userandtokenmissing=The username and confluence token are not available. Add them using 'edit object' confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.spacemissing=The space to analyse has not been provided. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.start=Starting the analysis. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.linktoreport=Reports are saved as {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.loops=Launching {0} loops. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.loop=Loop {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.infourl=Getting page info from {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pagesfound=Analyzing {0} pages. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pagefound=Found page {0} in the list of pages to be imported. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pagearchived=Archived page {0} not found in the list of pages to be imported. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pagenotfound={0} not found in the list of pages to be imported. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pagecheckerror=Error checking imported page {0} : {1}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.longpagename=Found long page ({0} : {1} located at {2}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.longfullhierarchy=Found long full hierarchy ({0}) : {1} located at {2}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.fullnamesize=Found full name size for page {0} : {1} with deep level {2}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pagecheckerror=Error processing page {0} : {1}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pages=Total number of pages : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.longpagenames=Number of long page names : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.longhierarchies=Number of long hierarchies : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.maxdeeplevel=Maximum deep level : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.save.error=Error saving status : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.data.error=Error retrieving data : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.pages=Final total number of pages : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.longpagenames=Final number of long page names : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.longhierarchies=Final number of long hierarchies : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.maxdeeplevel=Final maximum deep level : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.imported=Number of imported pages : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.missing=Number of pages that were not imported : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.remaining=Number of remaining pages : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.error=Error saving status result : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.url=The report is available at {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.space=Space name confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.spacehint=The name of the space to be analysed. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.nbdocs=Pages per run confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.nbdocshint=The number of pages to be analysed per run. By default, 100 pages will be checked per run. The nuumber of checks per run is limited, depending on the version of Confluence the instance has. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.start=Start from confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.starthint=Index of the page to start the analysis from, 0 being the index of the first page. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.nbruns=Number of runs confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.nbrunshint=Number of calls to the Confluence instance's REST Api. If there are more pages in your space than the results returned in one run, you have to increase the number of runs for making sure that all the pages in the space are analysed. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.hierarchy=With hierarchy analysis confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.importcheck=With page imported check confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.go=Go confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.job=Status of the analysis confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.params=Parameters confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.title=Confluence space analysis report for space {0} {1} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.docsnb=Number of documents analyzed : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.longpagenamesnb=Number of pages with long names : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.longhierarchiesnb=Number of long hierarchies : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.maxlevel=Deepest hierarchy level : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.importednb=Number of pages to import : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.skippednb=Number of pages to skip : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.remainingnb=Number of remaining pages not found in Confluence : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.skipped=Pages to skip from importing confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.noskipped=None. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.remaining=Pages not found in Confluence confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.noremaining=None. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.saving=Saving Confluence space report confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.importedpages.start=Getting the list of imported pages confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.importedpages.end=Finished getting the list of imported pages confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.partialimport=(partial import) confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.longpagenames=Long page names found confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.nolongpagenames=None. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.longhierarchies=Long hierarchies found confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.nolonghierarchies=None.
